oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Local food and supply security
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Valtari, Heidi
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Policy environments and social economy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Local food is a tool for reinforcing the vitality of rural regions. In addition to being a mean for guaranteeing supply security, it is also of interest to environmental, social and economic sciences. Instead of being a key to extensive economic growth, local and organic food is seen to represent alternative development possibilities for the agrifood sector.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Valtari, Heidi (2008) Local food and supply security. In: NJF Report, Nordic Association of Agricultural Scientists, 4 (7), p. 57.
